title: How can I submit a Press Release to the Star News or Better Living Magazine?
text:
You can reach the Better Living editor at rosemary.tiller@starnewsonline.com.



You can reach the StarNews newsroom by email at breakingnews@starnewsonline.com, fax at (910) 343-2227 and phone at (910) 343-2071.



To reach a specific StarNews content editor, go to http://www.starnewsonline.com/submit to find their contact information or go to http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/99999999/MISC/904129998#newsroom for a complete contact list for newsroom employees.
